components/products/usedtakeoffdetails:
Inspection Results

This item has been air pressure and visually inspected by our staff!

Every single one of our tires goes through 2 inspections - when it arrives and before shipment.

Tires are inspected for holes, bubbles, dry rot, uneven wear and air pressure. We only sell tires manufactured after 2011

It is possible that a tire has been professionally repaired with a stem patch according to RMA guidelines.

Our Inspection Process

We will do a visual inspection as well as a pressure test to each and every single one of our tires when it arrives.

We will repair any damage to R.M.A.(Rubber Manufacturers Association) guidelines.

That means:

  • The hole must be in the tread section of the tire
  • The hole must not exceeding 6mm in diameter
  • It must be repaired using both a stem and patch
  • We will NOT sell tires manufactured before 2011

To alleviate any concerns you may have, we have a full 90 Day, No Hassle Return Policy.

Read some of our reviews and you'll see that keep our word.
